DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the Pharmacokinetic (PK) and Pharmacodynamic (PD) effects of Prednisolone on Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA) patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Prednisolone On Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Meet the ACR criteria for diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis. Required treatment with Prednisolone. Currently on a nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent (NSAID). Willing to stay on current dose of NSAID for two weeks during study. Exclusion criteria: Major health issues such as osteoporosis, diabetes, heart failure, heart attack, kidney failure, or acute infection.
